title: kg to lbs | convert kg to pounds
text: Kilogram (kg) is a unit of mass in the International System of Units (SI). Kilo is a prefix for a factor of 1000. The original definition of kilogram was the mass of 1000 cubic centimeters (cm3) or 1 liter (L) of water. One kilogram is equal to 1000 grams (g). One kilogram is equal to 2.205 pounds (lbs). Pound (lb) is a unit of mass in the British imperial system of measurment and the United States customary system of measurement. One pound is equal to 0.454 of a kilogram (kg). One pound is equal to 16 ounces (oz). 1 pound (lb) is defined as exactly 0.45359237 kilograms (kg). 1 lb = 0.45359237 kg 1 kilogram (kg) is equal to 2.20462262185 pounds (lb). 1 kg = 2.20462262185 lb ≈ 2.205 lb The mass in pounds (lb) is equal to the mass in kilograms (kg) divided by 0.45359237: mass(lb) = mass(kg) / 0.45359237 Or pounds = kilograms / 0.45359237 Approximately pounds ≈ kilograms × 2.205 Convert 5kg to pounds: mass(lb) = 5 kg / 0.45359237 = 11.023 lb
